But when you start playing around with constitutions, just to prohibit somebody who cares about another person, it just seems to me that's not what America's about. quote: I don't think that a same-sex marriage is the way God intended it to be.

quote: I'm not for gay marriage, but I'm not for discriminating against people.

quote: There's lots of problem solving in any marriage, but when you have this collective goal that is a human being, it's an inspiring rally point.

quote: To say I drank my way into marriage isn't much of an exaggeration, and it's none at all to say I drank my way out of it.
name: Lawrence Block

quote: Marriage: love, honor, and negotiate.
name: Joe Moore

quote: I've learned this is a very long marriage doing a television show. I like the people that I work with to be people I enjoy, so you want to cast people who are as excited and enthusiastic as you are.
name: Shonda Rhimes

quote: I am a firm believer in marriage. In the future I will be married.
name: Elisabetta Canalis

quote: Marriage is one of the most sacred human institutions. I asked our Senators, as many South Dakotans have done, to protect marriage as a union between a man and a woman.
name: Mike Rounds

quote: Other than marriage, she doesn't control me and I don't control her.
name: Gavyn Davies

quote: My wife disagrees with 100 percent of what I say. That's the same marriage I have.
name: Curtis Sliwa
